name: Photosynthesia: The Game • Sen Chaipetch (Sen C)
name_original: Photosynthesia: The Game • Sen Chaipetch (Sen C)
description:
As a plant, you'll need to save the nature or the world from overgrowth of carbon dioxide. Photosynthesis is the key to turn these carbons to better goods & for your own survival to victory!

More levels, enemy types/abilities, player features in development.
